name: Apple Pie Granola
author: larkspur
summary: My family loves granola, so I've been experimenting with my recipe to create new variations. This tasty granola gets its sweet flavor from dried apples and apple juice concentrate. Store in an airtight container.
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Line a rimmed 10x15-inch baking sheet with aluminum foil
Combine oats, oat bran, and almonds in a large bowl
Pour onto the prepared baking sheet; coat with cooking spray
Bake in the preheated oven, stirring once, until toasted and fragrant, about 20 minutes
Combine honey, apple juice concentrate, and oil in a small saucepan
Cook and stir over low heat until heated through, about 5 minutes
Remove from heat; stir in cinnamon and nutmeg
Stir rice cereal, wheat germ, and apples into the oat mixture
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 15 to 20 minutes
Place baking sheet on a wire rack to cool
